text.page:
285
102-143a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsun+da de bI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das lha mo skul byed ma mthu dang stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dge bar mdzod cig /na maHsa b+tA nI/ saM myak+saM bud+d+ha ke TI nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le/ tsun+de swA hA/ brtson 'grus chen mo thogs pa med pa 'dul ba/ stobs che ba pha rol gnon pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa bsnams pa/ khro mo chen mo/ khro mo chen mo'i dbang phyug ma/ drag po'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas ma/ phyag stong mnga' ma/ ma pham ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod ma/ gdul bar dka' ma/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu sgrub ma/ rdo rje sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rjes 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/

286
102-143b rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i khu tshur ma/ rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stangs stabs can ma/ drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du sgyur bar ston par mdzad ma/ sku rdo rje dang bai DUr+ya'i rgyan gyis brgyan ma/ oM b+ha ga ba ti tsun+de/ d+h+raM d+h+ruM/ krUM krUM/ mrUM mrUM/ srUM srUM/ rUM rUM/ A be sha ya/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gr-ih+NA pa ya/ gr-ih+NA ba ya/ ha ra ha ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sdang ba'i gdon dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa dang / 'gro ba dang gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba dang / gdug pa de dag thams cad saM d+ha ya saM d+ha ya/ marda ya marda ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ tA pa ya tA pa ya/ ud+sA d+ha ya ut+sA d+ha ya/ ha na ha na badzre Na/ sa ra sa ra baN+De na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ khak+gen/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ tsUM tsUM tsUM/ drUM drUM drUM/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de sarba ar+tha sAd+ha ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma'i mthu dang byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzung pa rdzogs so//
